entity.name: Passengers disembark coronavirus-affected Diamond Princess cruise ship in Japan
entity.description: Passengers who tested negative for coronavirus on the Diamond Princess cruise ship have started to disembark in Yokohama, Japan. The ship, which carried around 3,700 people, has been quarantined in Yokohama since February 3.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @jdawsey1 Trump admin.overruled the CDC & gave the go ahead to allow the infected passengers w/coronavirus on Diamond Princess to fly w/other passengers on thesame plane from Japan to US. These federal workers helping w/the quarantine were not wearing proper protective gear. Now spreading!
